article_title: 2014 IN REVIEW From tragedy to triumph, a year to be remembered; Opiate overdoses, deaths create crisis in 2014
article_text:
North Andover, MA (01845)

Today

Partly cloudy in the morning followed by scattered thunderstorms in the afternoon. High near 85F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%..

Tonight

Partly cloudy skies. Low near 65F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.author: Shawn Regan sregan@eagletribune.com

og.description: Massachusetts and New Hampshire police responded to a noticeable increase in heroin overdoses early in 2014, mimicking a national trend that would not only continue, but explode into a full-blown
